Class Constants

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.logic.Constants
public final class Constants extends Object
A utility class containing constant values used throughout the Tetris game. This includes board dimensions, game speed, leveling parameters, and scoring rules.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    BOARD_HEIGHT
    The height of the game board in blocks.
    static final int
    BOARD_WIDTH
    The width of the game board in blocks.
    static final int
    INITIAL_TICK
    The initial delay (in milliseconds) between game ticks.
    static final int[]
    LEVEL_SPEED
    An array defining the game tick speed (in milliseconds) for each level.
    static final int
    LINES_PER_LEVEL
    The number of lines required to clear to advance to the next level.
    static final int
    MAX_LEVEL
    The maximum achievable game level.
    static final int[]
    SCORE_LINE_CLEAR
    An array defining the score awarded for clearing a specific number of lines at once.

      The maximum achievable game level.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • LEVEL_SPEED

      public static final int[] LEVEL_SPEED
      An array defining the game tick speed (in milliseconds) for each level. Speed decreases (game gets faster) with increasing level.

    • SCORE_LINE_CLEAR

      public static final int[] SCORE_LINE_CLEAR
      An array defining the score awarded for clearing a specific number of lines at once. Index 0 is for 0 lines, index 1 for 1 line, etc.
